Jobs.title: Chief Marcom Officer
Jobs.description: ', 'As CMO, I will be responsible to create a team of passionate professionals who focus on marketing , communication and fundraising for the Special Olympics Europe-Eurasia Games of 2014 in Antwerp. The team works in close collaboration with Special Olympics Belgium, Europe and International. The aim is to organise fabulous games and to create legacy for Special Olympics Belgium.', '

Jobs.title: Mentor
Jobs.description: ', 'At the Founder Institute I try to coach people who like to start meaningfull companies to get their act together.', '

Jobs.title: President and CEO
Jobs.description: ', "Hercules Trophy International is the mother company of all Hercules Trophy's worldwide.", '', 'Hercules Trophy is the networked teambuilding competition. One day, business teams of 5 to 7 people compete each other in 12 challenges with loads of fun. Hercules Trophy is a super-charged inter-company sporting team day, which builds camaraderie, embraces networking and promotes company loyalty. ', '', 'Hercules Trophy was founded in 1999 and has grown into a major player. More than 600 companies and thousands of people have already participated and keep coming back. Hercules Trophy is based in Belgium, The Netherlands, Spain, United Arab Emirates, Singapore, South Africa and the USA. More to come...', '

Jobs.title: Managing Partner
Jobs.description: ', "I'm co-responsible for the organisation of the Hercules Trophies in Belgium.", '

Jobs.title: Partner
Jobs.description: ', 'Footballfan wants to become the biggest football community; the place to be for all Belgian football fans and everyone involved in the sport. To this end, Footballfan has created a unique platform with value-added services for all football fans. Using specific services around community-building for both online and offline activities, the platform wants to enrich the overall football-experience of the fans.', 'Footballfan is an open and neutral platform with respect to clubs, sponsors, special interest groups and commercial enterprises. The operating model is based primarily on structural collaboration with partners and affiliates that offer a clear added value in realizing our mission.', '

Jobs.title: CEO
Jobs.description: ', 'Nascom is a young and dynamic web agency that specializes in Rich Internet Applications. We currently employ more than 60 people. Our headquarters at the Science Park (Wetenschapspark) in Diepenbeek and our satellite offices in Mechelen both keep us at a safe distance from all traffic jams to Antwerp and Brussels.', '', 'With the combined forces of our Software Development team, Design team and Flash team, we possess all the necessary skills to offer a complete service to our customers.', '

Jobs.title: Director Systems & Applications
Jobs.description: ', 'Director for the Belgian and Dutch team that focusses on ICT Systems & Applications. A business of 100mil EUR.', '

Jobs.title: Business Innovation Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Started the "security" business unit from scratch with a few people to become marketleader in 2 years time, inititated the biggest ICT-outsourcing deal for the Flemisch Government in Belgium, started a brandnew "systems" business unit and made it a multi-million dollar business in 2 years time with solid partners like Microsoft, NetApp, HP, etc.', '

Jobs.title: CIO
Jobs.description: ', 'In this position I was responsible for the Strategy and Operations of the global ICT department of Pauwels Trafo. Pauwels produces power- and distributiontransformers in Belgium, Ireland, US, Canada, Saudi Arabia and Indonesia and has sales offices and agents all over the world. Pauwels competes with Siemens, ABB, France Transfo, Alsthom,... I did this job during the golden ICT-days, which means I was able to do innovative projects in every possible ICT-domain (networking, telephony, systems, applications). As a member of the management council I was involved in all kinds of general management issues. Some examples: Introducing Theory of Constraints in one the business units, defining an eBusiness strategy in collaboration with large customers such as Electrabel and Nuon,...', '

Jobs.title: Project Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Was picked with a fellow student from University to introduce the principles Object Orientation as a new methodology within Royale Belge, one of the biggest insurers with mainly old school IT people. A huge transformation job for a rookie. The methodology was used for one of their biggest IT-projects: the new backoffice application for lifeinsurances.', '

summary: ', 'I just love my life and live it to the max! Had the chance to learn from great people in corporate life in different industries, different countries and in different jobs (though they were all pretty entrepreneural). ', '', 'My personal mantra is: dream, focus, team, network. You can follow me on www.yvesvekemans.com. I truly believe that everything we do is about Energy and Resonance.', '', "Right now I'm working on one of my big dreams: rolling out the Hercules Trophy in the whole world. Looks like my dream comes true.", '', 'We live in a flat world where people make the difference, where talented nomads work together around cool projects and where they stay connected through vital networks.', '
